WELCOME TO ANOTHER EPISODE OF POINTLESS BUILDING! Today I'm going to be Transforming the OVERWORLD into the END in my Minecraft Hardcore Lets Play! basically I built the end in the overworld in my hardcore minecraft world. This video is inspired directly by the time I transformed the nether into the overworld in Minecraft Hardcore as well as many other projects!

Watch the series from episode 1:
